headline: CUT, MAKE & TRIM
subheadline: If you already have sourced the fabrics and trims selection, our CMT production is a good choice for you.
paragraph1: Either you can transport the fabrics to our facility or we can do it for you. Upon receiving the tech pack, we first create the sample, ship it back, email the precise pricing and start the production process if everything settled.
paragraph2: We can start the production using your patterns or create the pattern construction for you.
